shrimp.name: Wood
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Wood pattern block, based on wood2.sl shader by Larry Gritz. "Txtscale" controls the overall scaling for the texture; "ringscale" controls the scaling for the wood rings spacing; "grainy" controls the relative graininess with 0 having no fine grain. The supplied surface point "pp" is transformed to "shader" space in this function, see header for more details.
